job_description: We are looking for a passionate Senior Frontend Developer to join our team in Malta. You will be responsible for building the ‘next generation’ of our client-facing applications.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS
3+ years of experience with React.js and Redux
Experience with TypeScript is a must
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines

job_description: Join our dynamic trading team in Malta. The successful candidate will be responsible for real-time odds compilation, risk management, and live event monitoring for a wide range of sports.
requirements: Excellent knowledge of a wide range of sports, especially football.
Strong mathematical and analytical skills.
Ability to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends.
Previous experience in a similar role is a strong asset.

job_description: We are seeking an experienced Head of Compliance to lead our regulatory efforts in line with MGA and other European jurisdictions. This role is critical for ensuring our products and operations adhere to the highest standards.
requirements: In-depth knowledge of MGA regulations.
5+ years in a senior compliance role within the iGaming industry.
Proven experience in developing and implementing compliance frameworks.
Legal background or qualification is highly desirable.

job_description: Seeking a creative and data-driven Digital Marketing Manager to lead our online presence. You will manage SEO, SEM, social media, and email marketing campaigns for our portfolio of clients.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in digital marketing.
Proven success in managing SEO/SEM campaigns.
Strong understanding of analytics tools (Google Analytics, etc.).
Experience in a client-facing role is a plus.

job_description: Are you passionate about creating exciting and innovative slot games? We're looking for a skilled Game Developer to join our studio and work on new titles from concept to launch.
requirements: Proficiency in C++ or JavaScript/TypeScript.
Experience with game engines like PixiJS or Phaser.
A portfolio of completed game projects.
Understanding of the mathematics behind slot machine mechanics.

job_description: The Fund Accountant will be responsible for the accounting of a portfolio of funds, including the preparation of NAVs, financial statements, and regulatory reporting.
requirements: Degree in Accounting or related field.
1-3 years of experience in fund administration or a similar role.
Knowledge of IFRS and GAPSME.
Detail-oriented with strong analytical skills.

job_description: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us build and maintain our scalable and resilient infrastructure on AWS. You will work closely with development teams to automate our processes.
requirements: Strong experience with AWS.
Proficiency in scripting languages like Python or Bash.
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
Knowledge of CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
